alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 8:36PM EST until January 15 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow and very strong winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet in the most persistent lake snows, with local amounts of 2 to 3 feet where the bands persist the longest. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Near blizzard conditions at times, especially tonight and Sunday. * WHERE...Erie, Genesee, and Wyoming counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Monday. The band of heavy lake effect snow will oscillate north and south numerous times during this event. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible at times with deep snow cover on roads. Widespread blowing snow will reduce visibility to near zero in lake effect bands.
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming
